(:action make ;  Make a connection or creation process for an item
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (not (connected ?actor ?item)) (has_item ?actor ?item))
  :effect (connected ?actor ?item)
)

(:action talk
    :parameters (?p - player ?mic - microphone ?voice - voice ?advice - advice)
    :precondition (and (microphone_connected ?p ?mic) 
                       (panel_checked ?p voice_panel) 
                       (not (talking ?p ?voice)) 
                       (not (advising ?p ?advice)))
    :effect (and (talking ?p ?voice) 
                 (advising ?p ?advice))

(:action use ; Use a resource and update usage status
:parameters (?user - agent ?resource - item)
:precondition (and (available ?user) (not (using ?user ?resource)))
:effect (using ?user ?resource))
